metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0192 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Apache Solr versions 5.0.0 to 5.5.5 and 6.0.0 to 6.6.5, the Config API allows to configure the JMX server via an HTTP POST request. By pointing it to a malicious RMI server, an attacker could take advantage of Solr's unsafe deserialization to trigger remote code execution on the Solr side.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
